basic_info.description_header: Errol Vidad, Navy Veteran, PMP, Top Secret/SCI
basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm Errol Vidad a Software Developer and Navy Veteran with a degree in Mathematics and an active TS/SCI clearance. While in the Navy, I planned operations to hunt submarines, I oversaw operations for an engineering plant, and I taught trigonometry and its application to Navy tactics. As a civilian, I was a systems analyst responsible for balancing customer requirements with software development development plans to improve technical processes. This eventually sparked my interest in software development and led me to enroll in a 6-month coding bootcamp to learn Python and JavaScript. I'm currently seeking employment and I'm looking for opportunities within a defense tech company so I can leverage my military background and software development skills to positively impact defense-related software projects.

projects.title: CineMood
projects.description: Finding a movie to watch may take longer than watching a movie. CineMood allows the user to receive a movie recommendation based off the genre they choose and their current mood.

projects.title: Prismatic Puzzle
projects.description: Desktop app developed for users interested in increasing problem-solving skills through a fun and challenging digital puzzle game.

projects.title: Sunbursts
projects.description: Data visualization tool designed to enhance strategic decision-making for BeSpace Consulting services. Generates circular bar plots that visually represent complex datasets for clearer, insight-driven business decisions.
